extendedInfo.description: IT'S MURPHY'S LAW "Tablet Edition" The doors of Jazan Wild's Funhouse of Horrors are open again. This ongoing collection of stories provides another ghostly tale of the living-impaired through the eyes of the lead character, horror writer Jake Stone. Where there's a haunted house, there's someone's story.Stone enters a small New Mexico town to investigate the legend of the haunted Murphy place. He finds an escort to the house on the edge of town from the local sheriff, and before you know it, both are consumed by the horrors that live inside. Are you prepared for a dark tale of treachery and loss?Enter, if you dare, into the second book of Jazan Wild's Funhouse of Horrors.This e-book is optimized for experiencing on your Android tablet.
